page.description: Add a new picture to the document. The image can be specified as a file name or blob value.

argument.name: FileName
argument.description: The image file to add to the document. Formats supported include BMP, DIB, PNG, JPG and WMF.

argument.name: Image
argument.description: The image as a blob value to add to the document. Formats supported include BMP, DIB, PNG, JPG and WMF.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns an index value that can be used to reference the image in other functions such as Office::Spreadsheet::SetPicture().
